name: Ensure cable ladders and trays are provided to support cable. (6)
Ensure cable ladders and trays have enough support, and 50% spare capacity. (50% spare capacity as per original design.) (6)
Ensure cable ladder and tray is installed to manufacturer’s instructions, complete with all necessary splice plates, bends, and fixings. (6)
Ensure adequate access for replacing, inspecting, or adding cable. (as at time of install.) (6)
Ensure seismic supports and bracing installed according to KCL design.) (7)
Photos to be taken of critical elements above as evidence of QA. (6)
